newsitem.title: HONG KONG: BNP names research chief for Asian private banking.
newsitem.headline: BNP names research chief for Asian private banking.

text.p: Banque Nationale de Paris said on Tuesday it had appointed Janet Lien as senior vice-president of its Asian private banking divison and head of regional research.

Lien, to be based in Hong Kong, would be responsible for BNP Private Banking Asia's research and strategies for the Asian financial markets, and would be involved in the dissemination of BNP's worldwide investment strategy, it said in a statment.
Before joining BNP, Lien was vice-president and head of Asian research at Chase Manhattan Bank.
